biotools.summary: It is a suite of perl scripts aimed at scannig a properly formatted set of protein sequences and their corresponding coding sequences and extract from them imperfect homopetidic repeats of a given amino acid. The user can define the nature of such residue and the maximal length and proportion of insertions tolerated, together with other search parameters.

bioschemas.name: AAstretch
